attributes.action: Hold to account all who deliberately lied to the public during the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details:
We wish for a judicial enquiry.
We want to know who made money, as a result and were they connected with either campaign?
If there is evidence of deliberate misrepresentation. 
We would like this acknowledged and the opportunity to hold a second referendum, before article 50 is invoked.
attributes.background:
Many voters were duped by fraudulent claims about what would happen following a Brexit vote and voted on that basis.
They were lied too.
Many claim fraudulently, as there will be some, that pocketed huge sums of money, based on the outcome.
